title: Reckoning Chromas are they tied to a specific skin?
body: As the title says!!!Reckoning Chromas are they tied to a specific skin or are they straight up for purchasing during the event?{{champion:80}}

replies.body: They are tied to a specific skin. They cost 300 tokens each (which I believe means you can earn one for free if you don't spend tokens on anything else, but I'd recommend checking the math on that) and are available through the Loot/Hextech Crafting system. Click on the PROJECT tokens in your loot and you'll see all the available content, the chromas included.
So i have to buy a skin 1st?
I believe you can *purchase* the chromas without owning the skin (though I've never personally tried so can't say for sure), but to *use* the chroma you have to own the skin yes.
